mapper.sql: select reply.reply_idx as replyIdx, reply.reply_contents as replyContents, reply.user_idx as userIdx, reply.board_idx as boardIdx, reply.reply_secret as replySecret, reply.reply_recipient as replyRecipient, reply.reply_date as replyDate, user.user_nickName as userNickname, board.board_title as boardTitle, board.board_subject as boardSubject, if(reply.user_idx=#{userIdx},1,0) as compare from reply left join user on reply.user_idx = user.user_idx left join board on reply.board_idx = board.board_idx
mapper.update: update reply set reply_contents=#{replyContents} and reply_secret=#{replySecret} where reply_idx=#{replyIdx}
mapper.select: where reply.board_idx=#{boardIdx} order by reply_date desc
mapper.update: update board set board_reply= board_reply+1 where board_idx=#{boardIdx}
update board set board_reply= board_reply-1 where board_idx=#{boardIdx}
mapper.select: where reply.user_idx=#{userIdx} order by reply_date desc
